oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard entitled "Treues Bedenken!" (Faithful Reflections)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This German postcard depicts a soldier looking over two children. The postcard is translated as "Faithful reflections/The pain of seperation can be alleviated in adversity and danger (when) one knows of the eternal love of (one's) wife and children." On the back is a German unit stamp which indicates that the sender was in the 2nd Replacement Co., 98th Imperial and Royal Regt. of the Austro-Hungarian Army. They were based in Bohemia. The note is written in Czech and addressed to Bohmisch Trubau.
